data.lyric:
[ti:Country Again]
[ar:Thomas Rhett]
[al:Country Again (Side A)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Country Again - Thomas Rhett
[00:04.23]Lyrics by：Thomas Rhett/Zach Crowell/Ashley Gorley
[00:08.46]Composed by：Thomas Rhett/Zach Crowell/Ashley Gorley
[00:12.70]I quit huntin' with my daddy guess I didn't make the time
[00:19.07]And it's been a year since I've seen a deer
[00:22.60]And a smallmouth on the line
[00:25.51]The other day I hooked a monster and as I reeled him in
[00:31.98]I thought "Man it feels good to be country again"
[00:40.93]I spent way less time in Nashville more time in L.A
[00:47.05]My back home buddies they quit callin' thought I had too much on my plate
[00:53.72]But last night we cracked some cold beers and cranked Eric Church to ten
[01:00.95]Man it feels good to be country again
[01:05.73]Yeah I love me some California but it sure ain't Tennessee
[01:12.20]And my roots down there in Georgia yeah they started missin' me
[01:19.13]And I wouldn't change the things I've done or the places that I've been
[01:25.82]Man it feels good to be country again
[01:34.47]I traded in my Silverado didn't need no four by four
[01:40.56]I tucked my boots in the back of the closet
[01:44.15]They didn't feel like me no more
[01:47.38]But I dug 'em out and slipped 'em on
[01:50.76]They been on my feet since then
[01:54.06]Man it feels good to be country again
[01:59.87]Oh-oh
[02:08.98]Yeah I love me some California but it sure ain't Tennessee
[02:15.52]Had roots down there in Georgia yeah they started missin' me
[02:22.39]And I wouldn't change things I've done or the places that I've been
[02:28.86]Man it feels good to be country again
[02:34.50]I traded sunsets with my wife for hours on my phone
[02:40.93]And even when I was right beside her I still wasn't really home
[02:47.46]But last night we built a fire watched the moonlight kiss her skin
[02:55.39]I thought "Man it feels good to be country again"
[03:01.58]"Man it feels good to be country again"
[03:06.96]Ooh
[03:13.30]I saw the light I found the way home
[03:19.75]Thank you Lord Amen
[03:26.50]Man it feels good to be country again
data.trans:
[ti:Country Again]
[ar:Thomas Rhett]
[al:Country Again (Side A)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.23]//
[00:08.46]//
[00:12.70]我已不再跟爸爸一起打猎 我想我没有腾出时间
[00:19.07]我已经有一年时间没有见过一头鹿
[00:22.60]以及咬着钓线的小口黑鲈
[00:25.51]几天以前 当我绕紧钓线 把鱼拉起来时 我钓到一只庞然大物
[00:31.98]我心想 天啊 回归田园的感觉妙不可言
[00:40.93]我待在纳什维尔的时间越来越少 大多数时间都在洛杉矶
[00:47.05]我家乡的朋友不会打来电话 他们觉得我太过繁忙
[00:53.72]但是昨晚 我们畅饮着冰镇啤酒 听着Eric Church的音乐 一直玩到十点
[01:00.95]天啊 回归田园的感觉妙不可言
[01:05.73]我喜欢加利福尼亚州 但这里毕竟不是田纳西州
[01:12.20]我深深扎根于佐治亚州 他们开始想念我
[01:19.13]我不会改变我做过的任何一件事 亦或是我去过的每一个地方
[01:25.82]天啊 回归田园的感觉妙不可言
[01:34.47]我卖掉我的雪佛兰皮卡 我不需要四轮驱动的汽车
[01:40.56]我把靴子塞进衣柜的后面
[01:44.15]它们似乎不再适合我
[01:47.38]但是我把靴子翻出来 重新穿上
[01:50.76]从那以后 它们就套在我的脚上
[01:54.06]天啊 回归田园的感觉妙不可言
[01:59.87]//
[02:08.98]我喜欢加利福尼亚州 但这里毕竟不是田纳西州
[02:15.52]深深扎根于佐治亚州 他们开始想念我
[02:22.39]我不会改变我做过的任何一件事 亦或是我去过的每一个地方
[02:28.86]天啊 回归田园的感觉妙不可言
[02:34.50]我与妻子分享绚烂的落日 我们打了好几个小时的电话
[02:40.93]即使我就陪在她身边 我依然没有感受到家的温暖
[02:47.46]但是昨晚 我们点燃篝火 看着月光洒在她的肌肤上
[02:55.39]我心想 天啊 回归田园的感觉妙不可言
[03:01.58]天啊 回归田园的感觉妙不可言
[03:06.96]//
[03:13.30]我看见光芒 我找到回家之路
[03:19.75]感谢上帝 阿门
[03:26.50]天啊 回归田园的感觉妙不可言
